info.heading: My Portfolio
info.subheading: Python Developer - Web Designer - JavaScript Devloper
info.about_left: Freelancer is a free bootstrap theme created by Start Bootstrap. The download includes the complete source files including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript as well as optional SASS stylesheets for easy customization.
info.about_right: You can create your own custom avatar for the masthead, change the icon in the dividers, and add your email address to the contact form to make it fully functional!
